text: Arau smarana karaa, yetiya ami kaichilo, ‘tomaloke e'i ga'omkhanata praraesa karai tara paraa yi iccha anandacitte ahara karaa arau duraarata praraesa karaomte sira nata karai praraesa karaiba. Arau ka’ba ‘hittatuna’ (ksama bicarao). Ami tomalokara aparaadha ksama karaima arau satkarmasilasakalaka arau adhika (anugraha) dana karaima’
